property.name: subPhy
property.label: Sub-PHY
property.desc: Select Bluetooth 5 LE sub-PHY, to be used in RF tests and as selected feature in exported generic commands

property.name: codedTxRate
property.label: Coded rate in TX
property.desc: Select Bluetooth 5 LE long-range coding for TX, to be used in RF tests and as selected feature in exported generic commands

LRFDRFE.IFAMPRFLDO.trim.comment: Trim, leave as 0 for "RCL". Handled by shadow registers in RFE RAM, and set in the synth cfg file.

LRFDRFE.DIV.nmireftrim.comment: leave as 0 for "RCL", values to be stored in RAM register DIVI and DIVF

LRFDRFE.DIV.pmireftrim.comment: leave as 0 for "RCL", values to be stored in RAM register DIVI and DIVF

LRFDRFE.MISC0.dlycancrs.comment: From eyeballing the simulation it seems value 0 means phe tracks modulation, value=2 seems random.

LRFDRFE.MISC0.dlycanfine.comment: From eyeballing the simulation it seems value 0  and 1 could be good choices to scramble the phe.

LRFDPBE.MDMCMDPAR0.val.comment: sw dependent preamble, use SW A (bit 13 = 0), 8 bit Preamble

data.name: LRF_PBE_CFG_BLE_1M_RAM
data.desc: PBE ram register config for BLE 1 Mbps

LRFDMDM.DEMIQMC0.phasefactor.comment: trim: leave as 0 for "RCL" , defaults set in  low_level_radio_libs

LRFDMDM.DEMIQMC0.gainfactor.comment: trim: leave as 0 for "RCL" , defaults set in  low_level_radio_libs   # 128 = 1.0

LRFDMDM.DEMMISC2.stimestonly.comment: Only estimate timing, do not correct

LRFDMDM.DEMFEXB0.b3srcsel.comment: BDE1 Takes CMIX as input (filt mode)

LRFDMDM.DEMDSXB0.b2srcsel.comment: MAFI has xbar input as input

LRFDMDM.DEMDSXB0.b1srcsel.comment: FIFE has xbar input as input

LRFDMDM.DEMFIFE0.iiruseinitial.comment: Do not use initial compensation value

LRFDMDM.SPARE0.val.comment: 10 us pilot, followed by loop dynamic change time. 3 us time adjust to allow 6 us for loop dynamic change, tone->preamble ~18.7 us

LRFDRFE.SPARE4.val.comment: We need to fill in something useful here

RFE_COMMON_RAM.SPARE0SHADOW.val.comment: changed for BLE1M , should be impacting GHS1M as well.

LRFDPBE.MDMCMDPAR0.val.comment: sw dependent preamble, use SW A (bit 13 = 0), 2 x 8 bit Preamble

data.name: LRF_PBE_CFG_BLE_2M_RAM
data.desc: PBE ram register config for BLE 2 Mbps

LRFDMDM.DEMIQMC0.phasefactor.comment: trim: leave as 0 for "RCL" , defaults set in  low_level_radio_libs

LRFDMDM.DEMIQMC0.gainfactor.comment: trim: leave as 0 for "RCL" , defaults set in  low_level_radio_libs   # 128 = 1.0

LRFDMDM.DEMMISC2.pdiflimitrange.comment: Limit range, +/- 64 is sufficient for HID + foffset

LRFDMDM.DEMFEXB0.b3srcsel.comment: BDE1 Takes CMIX as input (filt mode)

LRFDMDM.DEMDSXB0.b2srcsel.comment: MAFI has xbar input as input

LRFDMDM.DEMDSXB0.b1srcsel.comment: FIFE has xbar input as input

LRFDMDM.DEMFIFE0.iiruseinitial.comment: Do not use initial compensation value

LRFDMDM.SPARE0.val.comment: 10 us pilot, 5.5 us adjust to allow 6 us for loop dynamic change (there is some margin here, time from tone start till premable is 18.7 us

LRFDRFE.SPARE4.val.comment: We need to fill in something useful here

data.name: LRF_PBE_CFG_BLR
data.desc: PBE config for BLE5 Coded configuration

LRFDPBE.MDMCMDPAR0.val.comment: sync word and preamble settings to modem, use SW A (bit 13 = 0)

data.name: LRF_PBE_CFG_BLR_RAM
data.desc: PBE ram register config for BLE 1 Mbps

data.name: LRF_MDM_CFG_BLR
data.desc: Modem Config Bluetooth Long Range Mode

LRFDMDM.DEMIQMC0.phasefactor.comment: trim: leave as 0 for "RCL" , defaults set in  low_level_radio_libs

LRFDMDM.DEMIQMC0.gainfactor.comment: trim: leave as 0 for "RCL" , defaults set in  low_level_radio_libs   # 128 = 1.0

LRFDMDM.DEMMISC2.mafcgain.comment: x2 gain in MAFC due to low deviation

LRFDMDM.DEMDSBU.dsbudelay.comment: NB! Overridden by topsm on the fly

LRFDMDM.DEMFEXB0.out2srcsel.comment: Select unused HILB, avoid unecessary toggling

LRFDMDM.DEMFEXB0.b3srcsel.comment: BDE1 Takes CMIX as input (filt mode)

LRFDMDM.DEMDSXB0.b1srcsel.comment: FIFE has xbar input as input

LRFDMDM.DEMDSXB0.b2srcsel.comment: MAFI has FIFE output as input

LRFDMDM.DEMFIFE0.iiruseinitial.comment: Do not use initial compensation value

LRFDMDM.SPARE0.val.comment: 10 us pilot, 3 us adjust to allow 6 us for loop dynamic change (there is some margin here, time from tone start till premable is ~18 us.

LRFDRFE.SPARE0.val.comment: Based on PHy export AGC for coded .

RFE_COMMON_RAM.SPARE1SHADOW.val.comment: changed for coded to improve Selectivity after newIFADC settings.
